location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Material: coloured pencils and black ink on tracing paperDimensions: 327 x 245mm, on sheet 360 x 257mm

mods.abstract: A sketch showing the siting of Gwadar landing ground. The sketch is part of a letter (f 20) sent by Charles Clark Mylles, Assistant Manager at the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company Limited, to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire.
